text: Ramos sings for Dulce Osuna in 2017 Luz Ramos (April 20, 1987) is a Mexican television actress and film, known for her roles in biographical series such as; El Vato and Hasta que te conocí. She was recently cast as the star of the series based on the life of Jenni Rivera, Su nombre era Dolores, la Jenn que yo conocí. == Filmography == === Films === {| class="wikitable sortable" |- !
